name: MFMailComposeViewControllerDelegate
desc: An interface for responding to user interactions with a mail compose view controller.

items.name: func mailComposeController(MFMailComposeViewController, didFinishWith: MFMailComposeResult, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user wants to dismiss the mail composition view.

items.name: enum MFMailComposeResult
items.desc: Result codes returned when the mail composition interface is dismissed.
